PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-04522018-04-20,  ,  ,  PCH, 
ActNational Capital Act
SubjectLease with Kaliyana Artwear Inc. ** NCC **
PrecisOrder authorizing the NATIONAL CAPITAL COMMISSION to grant one option of five years, commencing on December 1, 2018, to renew an existing five-year lease with KALIYANA ARTWEAR INC., to occupy a property located at 515 Sussex Drive in Ottawa.
AttachmentsAttachment
